sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_69da080f2f1d201095d32d5df699b674
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="3228ea222ffc201095d32d5df699b676" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Shipping Request">8463272a2f11201095d32d5df699b686</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:203a3be62f51201095d32d5df699b6f5</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Pop Country If  Loc Changed</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	//Use GetRequestorLocation GlideAJAX method if shipping type is domestic.
	if(g_form.getValue('shipping_type') == 'domestic'){
		var getCountry = new GlideAjax('GetLocations');
		getCountry.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getLocationCountry');
		getCountry.addParam('sysparm_locationID', g_form.getValue('shipment_origin'));
		getCountry.getXML(populateCountry);
	}


	
	//Callback function that waits for the GlideAJAX call asynchronously and then populates the destination_country variable.
	function populateCountry(response){
		var locationCountry = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
		
		g_form.clearValue('destination_country');
		g_form.setValue('destination_country', locationCountry);
	}
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>saul.geller</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-12-29 15:08:22</sys_created_on><sys_domain>3228ea222ffc201095d32d5df699b676</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>!!!/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>69da080f2f1d201095d32d5df699b674</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Pop Country If  Loc Changed</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_69da080f2f1d201095d32d5df699b674</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>saul.geller</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-01-04 20:51:44</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_d23d75322fd5201095d32d5df699b65f
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="3228ea222ffc201095d32d5df699b676" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Shipping Request">8463272a2f11201095d32d5df699b686</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:ec977f622f51201095d32d5df699b605</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Populate Country If Domestic</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	//This script only runs if shipping_type is domestic. If so it uses a GetRequestorLocation GlideAJAX method
	//to get the country from whatever location is in shipment_origin.
	if(newValue == 'domestic'){
		var getCountry = new GlideAjax('GetLocations');
			getCountry.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getLocationCountry');
			getCountry.addParam('sysparm_locationID', g_form.getValue('shipment_origin'));
			getCountry.getXML(populateCountry);
	}
	
	//Callback function that waits asynchronously for the GlideAJAX call and then populates destination_country
	function populateCountry(response){
		var locationCountry = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
		
		g_form.clearValue('destination_country');
		g_form.setValue('destination_country', locationCountry);
	}
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>saul.geller</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-12-29 04:58:31</sys_created_on><sys_domain>3228ea222ffc201095d32d5df699b676</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>!!!/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>d23d75322fd5201095d32d5df699b65f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate Country If Domestic</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_d23d75322fd5201095d32d5df699b65f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>saul.geller</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-01-04 20:57:09</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_067e94b22fd1201095d32d5df699b613
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="3228ea222ffc201095d32d5df699b676" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Shipping Request">8463272a2f11201095d32d5df699b686</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:41c66bea2f11201095d32d5df699b6b9</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Get Location from Requested For</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	//This script should run onLoad as well so only an empty requested_for variable prevents it
   if ( newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

	//Use GetRequestorLocation GlideAJAX method to get the location of the requested_for user server-side and then 
	//asynchronously send it back to the client-side
	var getLoc = new GlideAjax('GetLocations');
	
	getLoc.addParam('sysparm_name','getUserLocation');
	getLoc.addParam('sysparm_userID', g_form.getValue('requested_for'));
	getLoc.getXML(populateLocationVars);
	
	//Callback function that waits asynchronously for the GlideAJAX call and populates the two location variables
	function populateLocationVars(response){
		var locationFromServer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
		
		g_form.clearValue('location');
		g_form.clearValue('shipment_origin');
		g_form.setValue('location', locationFromServer);
		g_form.setValue('shipment_origin', locationFromServer);
	}
	
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>saul.geller</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-12-28 22:27:22</sys_created_on><sys_domain>3228ea222ffc201095d32d5df699b676</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>!!!/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>067e94b22fd1201095d32d5df699b613</sys_id><sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get Location from Requested For</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_067e94b22fd1201095d32d5df699b613</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>saul.geller</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-01-04 20:51:13</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_f2cc903e2f91201095d32d5df699b626
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.GetLocations</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Uses GlideAJAX to find a related field based on a sys_id or being passed a string value for the city name, returns the first country that has a city with that name.</description><name>GetLocations</name><script><![CDATA[var GetLocations = Class.create();
GetLocations.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    
	getUserLocation: function(){
		var userRecord = new GlideRecord("sys_user");
		userRecord.get(this.getParameter('sysparm_userID'));

		return userRecord.location;
	},
	
	getCountryFromCity: function(){
		var cityLocation = new GlideRecord("cmn_location");
		cityLocation.addQuery('city','=',this.getParameter('sysparm_city'));
		var countryName = '';
		cityLocation.query();
		if(cityLocation.next()){
			countryName = cityLocation.getValue('country');
		}
		

		return countryName;
		
	},
	
	getLocationCountry: function(){
		var locationRecord = new GlideRecord("cmn_location");
		locationRecord.get(this.getParameter('sysparm_locationID'));
	
		return locationRecord.country;
	},
	
	type: 'GetLocations'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>saul.geller</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-12-28 21:55:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>f2cc903e2f91201095d32d5df699b626</sys_id><sys_mod_count>20</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetLocations</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_f2cc903e2f91201095d32d5df699b626</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>saul.geller</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-01-04 20:50:28</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="3228ea222ffc201095d32d5df699b676" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Shipping Request">8463272a2f11201095d32d5df699b686</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:9c5b3b6a2f51201095d32d5df699b6fe</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Pop Country if City Selected</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	//Use GetRequestorLocation GlideAJAX method.

	var getCountry = new GlideAjax('GetLocations');
	getCountry.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getCountryFromCity');
	getCountry.addParam('sysparm_city', g_form.getValue('destination_city'));
	
	getCountry.getXML(populateCountry);
	


	
	//Callback function that waits for the GlideAJAX call asynchronously and then populates the destination_country variable.
	function populateCountry(response){
		var locationCountry = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
		
		
		
		g_form.clearValue('destination_country');
		g_form.setValue('destination_country', locationCountry);
	}
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>saul.geller</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-12-30 03:44:36</sys_created_on><sys_domain>3228ea222ffc201095d32d5df699b676</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>!!!/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c3e7728f2fd1601095d32d5df699b6c4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Pop Country if City Selected</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_c3e7728f2fd1601095d32d5df699b6c4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>saul.geller</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-01-04 20:53:29</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
